_header: What is this life but one straight way to death
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of lyfe’ — one stanza rhyme royal

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Quhat is þis lyfe bot ane straucht way to deidQuhilk hes a
                    tyme to pas and name to duell…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…A schoirt torment for infineit glaidnesAls schort ane Ioy for
                    lestand hevynes

Banna.First Lines:
Quhat is this lyfe Ane draucht way to þe deidquhilk hes tyme
                    to pas and nane to dwell…
Banna.Last Lines:
…And schort torment for infinit glaidnesals schort ane Ioy for
                    lestand hevines
